Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.sql.sqlformatter

Class SQLFormatterSettings

java.lang.Object
de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.sql.sqlformatter.SQLFormatterSettings
public class SQLFormatterSettings extends Object
Utility class for Vertical Blank SQL formatter specific settings.
Author:
bahlef
